biography: Jonas, a familiar name at Vantaan Golfpuisto, has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on two occasions. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his presence has always been marked by a distinctive competitive spirit and camaraderie.

Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Jonas is admired by fellow players for his sportsmanship and attention to detail. While officially retired from the Hector Trophée, there remains a glimmer of hope among his fans that he might once again showcase his skills in future competitions. For now, we will not see him at Hector Trophée 2025, but as we know, things can change fast in golf.
